sentence: Celebrity physician-turned Senate candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz and several others at the conservative Pennsylvania Leadership Conference forum Saturday did not debate each other, but many took turns jabbing at Dave McCormick over his wealth and alleged ties to China.
author: Thomas Phippen
title: Pennsylvania GOP Senate primary: Dr. Oz, other candidates swipe at absent McCormick during forum

sentence: In a race expected to help determine the balance of power in the Senate, former hedge fund CEO Dave McCormick and celebrity physician Mehmet Oz are at the top of the polls.
author: Austin Kellerman
title: 4 things to watch for in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate Debate

sentence: Kathy Barnette, Jeff Bartos, Dave McCormick, Mehmet Oz, and Carla Sands will appear in the Pennsylvania Republican U.S. Senate debate on April 25 at 8 p.m. in a one-hour prime-time event airing in every market in the commonwealth.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania Senate Race Debate: Republican candidates face-off
